song.title: Water II (Double Dragon 3 Title)
song.info:
Used in "Nightshade's Harmony" by Ecstasy: [url]http://bitworld.bitfellas.org/demo.php?id=3708[/url]
"Jarre style music cut down to 186k used in slightly altered (fucked up!) version as title music of double dragon iii supposedly won the anarchy party music compo at winter conference feb 91 and regarded as my masterpiece samples made from akai s-900 sampler alesis hr-16 drum machine and roland mt-32 " - Nightshade
